modules.description: This module provides functions to create, destroy, and use OSC clients for sending packets to remote servers. It works with OSC client handles (`t`), socket addresses (`T.sockaddr`), and OSC packets (`Osc.Types.packet`). Concrete use cases include sending OSC messages or bundles over UDP to a specific network address using an OSC client instance.

This module implements OSC server creation and management, providing functions to bind to a socket address, receive packets with client addresses, and handle malformed messages. It operates on OSC packets and transport-layer socket addresses, returning parsed packets or typetag errors. Use it to build networked applications that listen for OSC messages, such as audio control servers or interactive installations.

This module generates OSC client and server implementations parameterized over a transport layer. It provides structured interfaces for sending and receiving OSC packets with concrete operations like client message transmission and server socket binding. Use it to implement networked applications such as audio control systems or interactive installations using OSC over UDP or similar transport protocols.

This module defines core data types for representing OSC packets, including timestamps, messages, and bundles. It provides structured types for time values, timetags, message addresses, and various argument types such as integers, floats, strings, and binary blobs. These types are used to construct and deconstruct OSC messages and bundles for network communication.

This module implements OSC client and server interfaces parameterized over a transport layer. It provides operations for sending and receiving OSC packets, including message transmission, socket binding, and packet parsing. It is used to build networked applications like audio control systems or interactive installations using OSC over UDP or similar protocols.

This module serializes and deserializes OSC packets to and from strings. It operates on `Osc.Types.packet` and handles string-based OSC data, returning results that indicate success or specific decoding errors. Use it to convert OSC messages for network transmission or storage, or to parse incoming OSC data into structured packets.

This module handles OSC packet construction, serialization, and network transmission. It defines types for OSC messages, bundles, and timestamps, encodes and decodes packets to and from binary format, and implements client-server communication over UDP. Used for building audio control systems and interactive installations that send and receive OSC data over the network.
